pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the wuming-cxt7-doc-demo repository, explaining its purpose as a configuration-based integration with the Context7 platform

pages.title: Configuration Reference
pages.purpose: Comprehensive documentation of the context7.json configuration file, its structure, and role in the system

pages.title: URL Configuration
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of the url field in context7.json, including the endpoint structure and namespace hierarchy

pages.title: Authentication Configuration
pages.purpose: Documentation of the public_key field, its format, and role in authenticating with the Context7 service

pages.title: System Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the overall architecture of the configuration-driven integration system and component interactions

pages.title: External Service Integration
pages.purpose: Detail how the system integrates with the context7.com platform, including the resource hierarchy and API communication patterns

pages.title: Authentication Flow
pages.purpose: Describe the authentication mechanism using the public key, including request preparation and security considerations

pages.title: Configuration Loading
pages.purpose: Explain the initialization process for loading and parsing the configuration file at application startup

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Provide practical guidance on using the context7.json configuration in an application environment

pages.title: Configuration Setup
pages.purpose: Step-by-step instructions for setting up and validating the context7.json configuration file

pages.title: Integration Implementation
pages.purpose: Guide for implementing the client code that consumes the configuration to interact with the Context7 platform
